item.title: Coming Soon!
item.description: 2019 content coming soon - just getting started!

item.title: The League
item.description: ‘19 Season Preview Draft Location: Convoy, OH Notable Rule Changes: Half-PPR ‘18 Season Recap 2018 Season Champion DeClayOfGame (Trav) had a decision to make heading into Week 10, sitting one game under 500 at 4-5, Trav saw an opportunity to buy and added extreme depth to his roster by trading for Joe Mixon and Michael Thomas - it cost him 2019 3rd and 4th round picks in the upcoming season.
